actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to increase the authorization for the special bridge replacement program under section 144 of title 23 of the United States Code.

summary.text: Amends the Highway Safety Act of 1976 to increase the authorization for appropriations for the special bridge replacement program.

titles.title: A bill to increase the authorization for the special bridge replacement program under section 144 of title 23 of the United States Code.
